fields.description: Different techniques used to acquire images from the database divided in 4 categories: underwater, macrophotography, landscape e microscopy.
fields.description_en: Different techniques used to acquire images from the database divided in 4 categories: underwater, macrophotography, landscape e microscopy.
fields.description_pt_br: Diferentes técnicas utilizadas para capturar as imagens do banco divididas em 4 categorias: submersa, macrofotografia, paisagem e microscopia.
fields.name: Technique

fields.description: Each life stage of an organism may have a different way of life. Therefore, this classification refers to the lifestyle depicted in the image.
fields.description_en: Each life stage of an organism may have a different way of life. Therefore, this classification refers to the lifestyle depicted in the image.
fields.description_pt_br: Cada estágio de vida de um organismo pode ter um modo de vida diferente. Por isso, essa classificação refere-se ao modo de vida da fase ilustrada na imagem.
fields.name: Life mode

fields.description: Organisms living on or in the sea bottom.
fields.description_en: Organisms living on or in the sea bottom.
fields.description_pt_br: Organismos que vivem no leito dos oceanos e mares, fixos ou não a um substrato.
fields.name: Benthic

fields.description: Organisms living in the water column.
fields.description_en: Organisms living in the water column.
fields.description_pt_br: Organismos que vivem na coluna d’água.
fields.name: Pelagic

fields.description: Microscopy techniques used to acquire the image.
fields.description_en: Microscopy techniques used to acquire the image.
fields.description_pt_br: Técnicas de microscopia utilizadas para capturar a imagem.
fields.name: Microscopy

fields.description: Tags that do not fit into other categories. Could be common terms frequently searched.
fields.description_en: Tags that do not fit into other categories. Could be common terms frequently searched.
fields.description_pt_br: Marcadores que não se encaixam nas outras categorias. Podem ser termos comuns frequentemente procurados.
fields.name: Miscellaneous

fields.description: We also indicate the habitat of each organism whenever possible.
fields.description_en: We also indicate the habitat of each organism whenever possible.
fields.description_pt_br: Também indicamos os habitats de cada organismo, quando possível.
fields.name: Habitat

fields.description: The organisms photographed are not always adults.
fields.description_en: The organisms photographed are not always adults.
fields.description_pt_br: Nem sempre os organismos fotografados são indivíduos adultos.
fields.name: Life stage
